title: The Selection
description: Twice a year, the alien Lord Toric demands a selection of human women between the ages of 18 and 20 to compete for a place in his harem. Maya must get through just one more selection and then she can marry the man of her dreams. She should have been safe, but when a young woman who was supposed to compete dies the day of the selection, Maya is forced into the competition.  Thrown into the fight of her life with no preparation, Maya must shed her innocence and win Lord Toricâ€™s favor. And there is only one winner in the competition. The losers will be sacrificed. Will she survive the first round, or will she pay the ultimate price for her inexperience?  Heat Level: Sweet to Mild
author: Jayne Faith
